Not food - An experience!  One of the best experiences I have had in 35 years!  I visited Montiel in 2012 and waited 3 years to come back as it was so amazing. So when I arrived today, the expectations were high... Surpassed!  This will be the highlight of my holiday!  The food was amazing, especially the Duck Ravioli and Suckling Pig.  The servers were the same as they were 3 years ago... the only thing more incredible than the food... the service!  Thank you so much Montiel for the experience!
